event.s: StoreList( CompatibilityInForce + CompatibilityInRegion + CompatibilityInProvince + CompatibilityWithPosts( true, PlayersFaction.GovermentPostsForCategory("default") ), "compatibility_list" )

ToUpper( GetIfElse(UndercoverInterfaceContext.UndercoverCharacterContext && UndercoverInterfaceContext.UndercoverCharacterContext.SourceFactionContext == PlayersFaction, UndercoverInterfaceContext.UndercoverCharacterContext.RoleNameInTargetFaction, GetIfElse(GovermentPostContext, GetIfElse(this.IsRegent, Loc("politics_character_regent"), GovermentPostContext.Name), CharacterRoleName) ) )

subtemplate.unicode: This Character is wounded and will recover in the indicated number of Seasons
This Character is unavailable and will return in the indicated number of Seasons
